page.title: 05TRANSPORT
page.content: Larbert is in the{transport}centre of Scotland.It is in the Golden Triangle which means that the shape of all the{ {roads}meet up in a triangle.The base of the triangle is the A.803 which joins up the local towns-Bonnybridge,Falkirk,Polmont and the sides of the triangle are the M.9 linking the North to Edinburgh, and the M.80 linking Glasgow to the North.Larbert Station is on the main line from both Edinburgh and Glasgow to the North.The advantage of living in the Larbert,Stenhousemuir area is that we are in the middle of the{road and{rail}network and that people and {goods}can go anywhere in Britain.
